comments.body: What about those commented deletes? Will they be fixed or should they be removed?
I was wondering whether we should keep non x64 libs around or not and decided to keep them. I kept the comment here as a reminder that we might want to do it later.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +21,25 @@      curl -L -O https://www.nuget.org/api/v2/package/VisualCppTools.Community.VS2017Layout/${MSVC_HEADERS_VERSION}
      unzip -o ${MSVC_HEADERS_VERSION} > /dev/null
      #find lib -type d -name "x86" -delete || true
      #find lib -type d -name "arm" -delete || true
      mkdir -p ${MSVC_HEADERS_DIR}/include
